channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat 3scale API Management Platform 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat 3scale API Management Platform 2

item.title: CVE-2024-9671|2024-10-09T14:32:10.972Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%203scale%20api%20management%20platform%202
item.description: A vulnerability was found in 3Scale. There is no auth mechanism to see a PDF invoice of a Developer user if the URL is known. Anyone can see the invoice if the URL is known or guessed.
